page_content: Discusses the importance and challenges of municipal traffic planning in Zürich.
Provides guidelines on the taxation of profit distributions from qualified participations in Switzerland.
Discusses the resignation and replacement of members in the educational commission for ICT, media, and informatics.
Indicates that the directive concerning the treatment of public waters, roads, and forests in land surveying in the Canton of Zürich has been repealed.
Discusses the replacement of a member in the educational commission for school evaluation.
Provides instructions on how to apply for the crediting of foreign withholding taxes in Switzerland.
Describes the responsibilities and organization of the Education Council in the Canton of Zürich.
